text.div:
ExplanationOfBenefit_BillablePeriodStart TU

Parameter billable-period-start:date

Starting Date of the service for the EOB using billablePeriod.period.start. The billable-period-start search parameter using the billablePeriod.period.start provides results with the earliest billablePeriod.start from a professional and non-clinician EOB or an oral EOB.

ResourceExplanationOfBenefit
ExpressionExplanationOfBenefit.billablePeriod.start
Processing ModeNormal
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values
ComparatorsAllowed: eq, ne, gt, ge, lt, le, sa, eb, ap

name: ExplanationOfBenefit_BillablePeriodStart
description: Starting Date of the service for the EOB using billablePeriod.period.start. The billable-period-start search parameter using the billablePeriod.period.start provides results with the earliest billablePeriod.start from a professional and non-clinician EOB or an oral EOB.
